text: Prodotia is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pisaniidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Prodotia include: * Prodotia castanea (Melvill, 1912) * Prodotia crocata (Reeve, 1846) * Prodotia iostoma (Gray, 1834) * Prodotia lannumi (Schwengel, 1950) * Prodotia naevosa (Martens, 1880) * Prodotia shepstonensis (Tomlin, 1926) * Prodotia townsendi (Melvill, 1918) ;Species brought into synonymy: * Prodotia iostomus [sic] accepted as Prodotia iostoma (Gray, 1834) ==References== Category:Pisaniidae
title: Prodotia
